idea-plugin.name: Windows Terminal Theme for JetBrains
idea-plugin.description:
Windows Terminal & PowerShell Themes for JetBrains IDEs

Import any Windows Terminal color scheme as a complete IntelliJ theme with matching console colors!

Features

  • 60+ Windows Terminal Themes: Popular schemes including Dracula, Nord, Tokyo Night, Gruvbox, Catppuccin, Solarized, and more
  • Full ANSI Color Support: All 16 console colors perfectly mapped from Windows Terminal
  • Intelligent Syntax Highlighting: Automatic color inference for 100+ language attributes
  • Consistent Colors: Match your PowerShell terminal and IDE for a unified experience
  • Accessibility Focused: All themes audited for WCAG AA compliance
  • Custom Scheme Support: Import your own Windows Terminal color schemes

Popular Included Themes

  • Dark: Dracula, Nord, Tokyo Night, Gruvbox Dark, Catppuccin Mocha, GitHub Dark, Material, Monokai, Solarized Dark
  • Light: Solarized Light, Gruvbox Light, Ayu Light, Atom One Light

What's New in 7.0.0

  • Minimal Repository: Focused exclusively on Windows Terminal/PowerShell themes
  • 60+ Windows Terminal color schemes
  • Improved build performance and accessibility
  • Comprehensive documentation

See the GitHub repository for documentation, screenshots, and contribution guidelines.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 7.0.0 - Windows Terminal Focus

  • Repository Cleanup: Removed One Dark theme-specific code, now focused on Windows Terminal themes
  • 60+ Windows Terminal Themes: Import any Windows Terminal color scheme
  • Performance: Optimized build process with parallel processing and caching
  • Accessibility: All themes audited for WCAG AA compliance
  • Breaking Change: One Dark theme variants removed - Windows Terminal themes only

See CHANGELOG.md for complete release notes.
